description.value:
This cute and unassuming dragon toy activates once a creature moves into its square. It then unleashes a rapid burst of toxic gas in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10-foot emanation}. Those within the emanation when the snare is activated must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] Fortitude saving throw or take @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2}.
